verses.verse: To you I do lift up <S%H5375><s%> my eyes, <S%H5869><s%> you who sit <S%H3427><s%> in the heavens. <S%H8064><s%>

Behold, <S%H5869><s%> as the eyes of servants <S%H5650><s%> look to the hand <S%H3027><s%> of their master, <S%H113><s%> as the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of a maid <S%H8198><s%> to the hand <S%H3027><s%> of her mistress; <S%H1404><s%> so our eyes <S%H5869><s%> look to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> until he has mercy on us. <S%H2603><s%>
Have mercy <S%H2603><s%> on us, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, have mercy <S%H2603><s%> on us, <S%H7227><s%> for we have endured much <S%H7646><s%> contempt. <S%H937><s%>

Our soul <S%H5315><s%> is exceedingly <S%H7227><s%> filled <S%H7646><s%> with the scoffing <S%H3933><s%> of those who are at ease, <S%H7600><s%> with the contempt <S%H937><s%> of the proud. <S%H1343><s%>
